## ContextMenuRegistry namespace

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare namespace ContextMenuRegistry 
```

## Enumerations

<table><thead><tr><th>

Enumeration


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[ScopeType](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.scopetype_enum.md)


</td><td>

Where this menu item should be rendered. If the menu item should be rendered in multiple scopes, e.g. on both a block and a workspace, it should be registered for each scope.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

[CoreContextMenuOption](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.corecontextmenuoption_interface.md)


</td><td>

Fields common to all context menu items as used by contextmenu.ts.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[CoreRegistryItem](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.coreregistryitem_interface.md)


</td><td>

Fields common to all context menu registry items.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[LegacyContextMenuOption](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.legacycontextmenuoption_interface.md)


</td><td>

A subset of ContextMenuOption corresponding to what was publicly documented. ContextMenuOption should be preferred for new code.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Scope](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.scope_interface.md)


</td><td>

The actual workspace/block/focused object where the menu is being rendered. This is passed to callback and displayText functions that depend on this information.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[SeparatorContextMenuOption](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.separatorcontextmenuoption_interface.md)


</td><td>

A representation of a menu separator item in contextmenu.ts.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[SeparatorRegistryItem](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_namespace.separatorregistryitem_interface.md)


</td><td>

A representation of a menu separator item in the registry.


</td></tr>
